name: Cat Ball (MysticalPiano)
description: An endless survival game where you play as a cat. There are 3 different types of enemies you have to shoot. There is a fast enemy, a fat enemy(moves slow), and a shooter enemy(that shoots back at you). The fast enemy does 1 damage to you, the fat enemy does 3 damage to you, and the shooter enemy does 2 damage to you. You have a total of 8 health. Each of them as a different amount of health as well. The fast enemy dies in 2 shots, the fat enemy dies in 3 shots, and the shooter enemy dies in 5 shots. There are also 3 different levels of difficulty. They affect your movement speed, the health of the enemies, and the damage they inflict. For the controls, use aswd.
